title: Funding Strategy Education Module for Technology Commercialization

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Collaborative project based on real technology commercialization cases, blended learning environment combining online discussions and offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three government and private funding sources for technology commercialization.
Learners can analyze real-world technology commercialization cases to develop a funding plan.
Learners can revise and optimize funding strategies based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
